lead_paragraph: The law, which took effect on June 9, will not be blocked now, but the judge agreed to allow a lawsuit challenging the measure to go forward.

headline.print_headline: Judge Refuses to Block Assisted Suicides
headline.main: California Judge Rejects Request to Suspend Assisted Suicide Law

snippet: The law, which took effect on June 9, will not be blocked now, but the judge agreed to allow a lawsuit challenging the measure to go forward....
abstract: California judge denies request to suspend new state law that lets certain terminally ill adult patients end their own lives with medication; allows group of physicians who brought motion to pursue their legal challenge to law.
